AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hunter's Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was taught as a child with an emphasis on the means of hunting prey. Because of this experience, she knows how to hunt deer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Collecting Children
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] knew better than anyone how to get edible fruit from the great outdoors. That experience has served him well in cultivation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child with a Commercial Spirit
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: When [PAWN_nameDef] was a child, she used to observe adults trading with different species. This experience made her a bit better at trading.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Child Watching a Blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Living in a different colony, [PAWN_nameDef] often observed blacksmithing. From this experience, she acquired a little knowledge of blacksmithing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Children watching Medical
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Living in a different colony, [PAWN_nameDef] was often under the care of a doctor because she was constantly injured. This experience taught her a bit of medical knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy's Hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fearsome hunter who can handle a gun with precision.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy's Collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked tirelessly to gather fruit from the surrounding environment in order to collect the fruits and other ingredients needed for preserves. This experience gave her a very high aptitude for cultivation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy's Cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had the role of preserving food that was gathered by her friends. This experience gave her a very high aptitude for cooking.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy's Trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traded with different tribes. This experience gave her a very high level of sociability.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmed Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born by aquaculture in an experimental facility. She was trained in various labors in order to be able to do one thing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Stray Child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had somehow strayed from the herd. She was then captured by a slaver of a different race and turned into merchandise.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy Mining Slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a slave digging mines. Because of their aptitude for carrying things, they were also useful as ore carriers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy Combat Slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a slave soldier. Some people were horrified by the sight of him holding a shotgun in his hand and taking out the enemy ahead of him.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Glassy Craft Slave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a slave solely to make weapons.
